org.qscript.events

Class EvaluationErrorEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.EventObject
      • org.qscript.events.ScriptEvent
        • org.qscript.events.EvaluationErrorEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class EvaluationErrorEvent
extends ScriptEvent
    Event fired when we get an evaluation (runtime) error
    Author:
    Peter Lager

    • Constructor Detail

      • EvaluationErrorEvent

        public EvaluationErrorEvent(Script script,
                    ErrorType etype,
                    int lineNo,
                    int pos,
                    int width,
                    Object[] extra)
        The basis for all script events
        Parameters:
        script - the source of the event
        etype - the error type (if event caused by error)
        lineNo - line number where the event was fired
        pos - the position in the source code where the token starts
        width - the width (chars) of the token
        extra - this extra object is specific to this event

      • EvaluationErrorEvent

                    int lineNo,
                    int pos,
                    int width)
        The basis for all script events
        Parameters:
        script - the source of the event
        etype - the error type (if event caused by error)
        lineNo - line number where the event was fired
        pos - the position in the source code where the token starts
        width - the width (chars) of the token
